translations: n.上议院；（前面与 the 连用）上院议员

sentences.sentence: I guess they must've been really appealing to those knights and lords who were listening to them.
sentences.translation: 我猜他们对于那些听他们演讲的骑士和贵族一定很有吸引力。

sentences.sentence: Diplomacy was in his blood: his ancestors had been feudal lords.
sentences.translation: 他的外交能力是天生的：他的祖上曾是封建王侯。

sentences.sentence: William Shakespeare could please all kinds of people including Kings, Queens, Princes, great lords and ladies, poor people, the boys who held the horses...everyone.
sentences.translation: 威廉·莎士比亚能取悦各种各样的人，包括国王、女王、王子、贵族和贵妇、穷人、马夫……所有人。
